Download the CoV open data catalogue

Source: R/datasets.R
list_cov_datasets.Rd

Download the CoV open data catalogue

list_cov_datasets(trim = TRUE,
  apikey = getOption("VancouverOpenDataApiKey"), refresh = FALSE)

Arguments

trim

trim all NA columns, optional, defaul `TRUE`
apikey

the CoV open data API key, optional
refresh

refresh cached data, default `FALSE``

Value

tibble format data table output

Examples

# List and search available datasets
list_cov_datasets()
#> # A tibble: 167 x 20
#>    dataset_id title keyword `search-term` datasetid `data-owner` `data-team`
